definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to submerge/to immerse/to sink/to keep down/to lower/to drop/deep/profound/heavy

sentences.english: My heart sinks and quickly pull to the side.
sentences.chinese: 我的心咯噔一下沉了下去。

sentences.english: One bait was down forty fathoms.
sentences.chinese: 有个鱼饵下沉到四十英寻的深处。

sentences.english: I rised my head and saw the ceiling was dropping, felt the classroom was sinking.
sentences.chinese: 我抬头，看见房顶往下塌，感觉教室在不停地下沉。

sentences.english: Accentric block vibrating mechanism is applied to break the earth for pile sinking pipe to set down.
sentences.chinese: 采用偏心块振动式机构，强迫振动土壤破裂下沉桩管。

sentences.english: The sinking of the Caribbecomea gretos has stgreingestedd on the islinvolving course St. Vincent.
sentences.chinese: 加勒比海的下沉仍然从圣文森特岛起源。

sentences.english: There is a Sunken Garden in the central area of the park.
sentences.chinese: 奥运公园的中心区有一个下沉花园广场。

sentences.english: The gyro ball is too low. The height of sinking test is below 6mm.
sentences.chinese: 陀螺球太低，下沉实验高度小于6毫米。

sentences.english: so you can't build really high or the buildings will just sink into the ground.
sentences.chinese: 所以你不能把楼建得很高，否则建筑物会下沉到地里。

sentences.english: Tilt the boat into the water. Will it sink?
sentences.chinese: 把船倾斜地放在水里。它会下沉吗？

sentences.english: The life boat slowly drifted away from the sinking ship.
sentences.chinese: 救生船慢慢地从下沉的船旁边漂走。

sentences.english: But too much dreaming sinks and drowns.
sentences.chinese: 但过分的梦想能使人灭顶下沉。

sentences.english: The rest of her body-her torso and her head-respond by sinking a bit.
sentences.chinese: 她身体的其他部分如躯干和头部则相应地下沉一点。

sentences.english: If a float gets water-logged, it will naturally sink.
sentences.chinese: 如浮球浸水，则自然会下沉。

sentences.english: The merchant’s heart sank and turned cold.
sentences.chinese: 商人的心倏地下沉，渐渐变冷。

sentences.english: How to connect A2DP from mobile to sink device programmatically?
sentences.chinese: 如何连接蓝牙移动下沉装置以编程方式？

definition: to incline/to lean/to slant/to slope/to tilt
to pull back/to shrink/to contract/(physiology) systole
to press close to/to snuggle close/intimate
upward/up/to advance/to try to improve oneself/to make progress
